|flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/09/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "BCM94360MCH5", "T77H391"appears to be silkscreened on the board. :This is presumably an 11ac module for AP's. {{WiFiCert|WFA58711|02/23/2015}} *[[Foxconn T77H391]] - '''Broadcom BCM94360MC''' rev.H5 3x3 :[[Netgear R6300 v1]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 3T3R 802.11ac *[[Foxconn T77H403]] - '''Broadcom BCM94360MC''' rev.H5 2x2 :[[Netgear R6200v1]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4352 2T2R 802.11ac {{see also|Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC (UAP-AC)}} ==Notes== ===Specifications=== *[[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4360 BCM4360] 802.11ac 3T3R MAC/PHY/Radio *[https://github.com/rusxakep/asuswrt-security/blob/master/release/src-rt-6.x.4708/cfe/build/broadcom/bcm947xx/compressed/rt-ac56u_nvram.txt GitHub AsusWRT]

BCM4360_D11AC_ID	0x43a0	/* ac dualband PCI */
BCM4360_D11AC2G_ID	0x43a1	/* 4360 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM4360_D11AC5G_ID	0x43a2	/* 4360 802.11ac 5G device */
BCM43602_D11AC_ID	0x43ba	/* ac dualband PCI devid SPROM */
BCM43602_D11AC2G_ID	0x43bb	/* 43602 802.11ac 2.4G device */
BCM43602_D11AC5G_ID	0x43bc	/* 43602 802.11ac 5G device */
==See also== *[[Broadcom BCM94709R]] • 802.11an/ac 4x4 Wireless Access Point :''Broadcom BCM94709R-M/H 802.11 a/n/ac Access Point'' :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0, WLAN: BCM4366E, 4x PAM/LNA *[[Broadcom BCM94366MC]] • 802.11ac 4x4 Wireless Mini PCIe Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1091 QDS-BRCM1091] (2017-04-14) - BCM94709R-M :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/QDS-BRCM1092 QDS-BRCM1092] (2017-04-18) - BCM94709R-H *[[Broadcom BCM94709R4366AC]] • 802.11ac 4x4 Wireless PCIe Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-PCIE0U00 MSQ-PCIE0U00] (2015-11-23) *Broadcom BCM94360MC *[[Broadcom BCM94360CD]] *[[Broadcom BCM94360CS]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
